Articles.Content:
Got the new version via Steam today and tried to load it.  Got the usual mods out of date messages that I have successfully ignored for a year or so.  Anyway, started a new sandbox game and tried a simple launch, the game disappeared back to desktop (win 10 64 bit) when I hit the launch button for the VAB.   Tried a few times and the same every time.  Assuming it was a  mod issue I moved ALL mod folders out of the Game Data and tried again, now the game never loads at all.

 

Here are the mods I moved out of game data

 

Any thoughts?

The Squad and SquadExpansion folders are not mods.  They're the stock game.

The 1.8 update is going to break a lot of mods.

I would move the Squad and SquadExpansion folders back in.  Then do a file validation with Steam.  Make sure it works stock, then add the mods back one by one and see if they work.

I also see you have a "GameData" folder in your list.  This is pretty atypical and likely indicates a mod installed incorrectly.

Since your core issue seems to be mod related, I'm moving this to the modded tech support subforum.
